content: about pattern - stitch-by-stitch knitting pattern + video tutorials how to assemble + knitting stitches - process photos - detailed how-to assemble instructions - all yarn parameters are given so you can choose the yarn from your stash as well - tools recommendations knitted flat on 2 needles + knitted in the round version for most of toy s parts wishing you all a holiday season filled with joy but don t forget the grinch is always lurking nearby
